hints.content:
$\blue1\pink2$ has $\blue1$ ten and $\pink2$ ones.

$\blue{2}\pink{9}$ has $\blue2$ tens and $\pink9$ ones.

$\blue4\pink2$ has $\blue4$ tens and $\pink2$ ones.  

$\blue6\pink1$ has $\blue6$ tens and $\pink1$ ones.

The least number is $12$ because it has $1$ ten and $2$ ones.

The greatest number is $61$ because it has $6$ tens and $1$ ones.
Here are the numbers in order from least to greatest: $12$, $29$, $42$, $61$.
